title: Mondraker Summum DH bike goes carbon, MINDs its suspension with digital tracking
content:
Introduced in alloy form last fall after taking a number of top spots on the downhill world stage (it swept the podium at the Val di Sol World Championships), the new Mondraker Summum Carbon DH bike brings all of the brand’s top level tech to the gravity game.
